Key Match Events: Congo equalized just before halftime after South Africa took the lead
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa was expected to 'wallop' Congo based on their previous performance
Post-Match Reflections: Bafana's draw leaves them on the cusp of qualifying for Afcon; Congo's late equalizer turned the match in their favor
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of a broader context of qualification efforts by multiple teams
